spi.name: Temporary
spi.tooltip:
Create a TEMPORARY table.

A TEMPORARY table is visible only to the current connection, and is dropped automatically when the connection is closed.

spi.name: IfNotExists
spi.gui-text: Create only if the table does not exist
spi.tooltip:
Specify the IF NOT EXISTS option.

The keywords IF NOT EXISTS prevent an error from occurring if the table exists. However, there is no verification that the existing table has a structure identical to that indicated by the CREATE TABLE statement.

spi.name: AutoIncrementTableInitial
spi.tooltip: The initial AUTO_INCREMENT value for the table.

spi.name: AverageRowLength
spi.tooltip:
An approximation of the average row length for your table.

You need to set this only for large tables with variable-size rows."

spi.name: StorageEngine
spi.tooltip:
The Storage engine of the table.

You can select which storage engine to use for the table you defined.

Warning: Only tables defined with the InnoDB storage engine support foreign keys

spi.name: Codepage
spi.tooltip: The Codepage for the given table

spi.name: IndexType
spi.tooltip: Which Index type should the DB use

spi.name: IndexCategory
spi.tooltip: The Index Category of the index

spi.name: ColumnOfIndexUsedLength
spi.gui-text: The Length of the columns' data which is used in the length
spi.tooltip: The Length of the column used in an index. This can be assigned only to TEXT/BLOB type columns
